TicTacToe

Class AggressivePolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • TicTacToe.Policy
      • TicTacToe.AggressivePolicy

  • public class AggressivePolicy
extends Policy
    An agrgessive policy: if there is a winning move given a game state (Game object) then this policy finds it. Otherwise returns a random available move.
    Author:
    ae187

      • Fields inherited from class TicTacToe.Policy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Move getMove(Game g)
      Default behaviour here is that if the game state is not in the policy map Policy.policy then the policy returns null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AggressivePolicy

    • Method Detail

      • getMove

        public Move getMove(Game g)
        Description copied from class: Policy
        Default behaviour here is that if the game state is not in the policy map Policy.policy then the policy returns null. You can override this method for different behaviours, e.g. returning a random move if this happens.
        Overrides:
        getMove in class Policy
        Parameters:
        g - a Game
        Returns:
